Ok for individual scores (I deleted the previous comment so this is a respost, because I decided to rescore lol): Katou Chakichi 7/10, Kanbayashi Takaki 7/10, Dhibi 8/10, Minase Seri 9/10 (I'm very impressed wtf), Aichi Shiho 9/10 (Fantastic as always), Bennys 8/10, Nanamatsu Kenji 10/10, MTNO 9/10, Coin Rand 8/10 (too short but quite great), Chinzurena 9/10, BINBI 9/10, Hanamaki Kaeru 9/10, Kaitou Yuuhi 8/10.

If you do not translate this, you WILL die..
Smh i need my trap waifus asap fam
The cover art. That was gold. Pure liquid gold. I really wanna celebrate christmas like that.

love wakin up to traps in the mornin
@dafucking try out Ero Shota Anthologies you might  get something that'll interest you over there https://nhentai.net/g/52235/

@dafucking Bruh how is it a 6 When BINBI, Kenji and fucking MTNO presented so much detail in their segments? Not just them even the others! Like in MTNO's part where he shows same position in different angles with an added details of visible ribs and at Kenji's part where he literally shows off different ass shots and sexy as fuck teasing for like 8 pages then proceeds into an insane 4 page no filler intense sex scene, and then we have BINBI who shows an insanely rough and impactful sex scene that even destroys his previous entries, like seriously the pairing between characters blend so well!!! And the rest literally goes for hella of a ride! But yeah I'm pretty sure you gave it a 6 for personal reasons (like how Fantano gives MBDTF a 6 even if it is Kanye's best work)

What a shame that i couldn't fap to any of Otokonoko lately and that might explain why so few trap shota yaoi are translated from new issues. Instead they translate alot of good old stuffs (which made me happy) but i think i need more good hentais than reading the one i found 3-4 years ago.

I gave this a 6/10. Ayato Ayari came back to draw... 1 colored pic (wtf man) and still missing alot of good artists out there like Xil, U-hi, Collagen, Takase Yuu, Inaba Cozy,.... I think you guys should read more Otoko Heaven if you think this issue is good :|
Praise the trap god!
Feelsgoodman

AAAAAAAAAAA This was absolutely fucking GOLD!!! (just like how the balls are is shown in the cover art) every artist even the one's I dislike are doing so well with everything, no bullshit close up shots that ruin the climaxes, no badly positioned sex and everything is just so impactful, hell even the colored images and colored pages are flames, my one problem is just Dhibi's art work not really growing on me that much, but even his way of presenting thing is impressive and what a surprise my most disliked artist here Chinzurena impressed me so much with how he showed the facial expressions of the characters, not just his work, everyone here! everything just blends so well together, I'll honestly give this a 9/10, and Imma write the individual scores too.
So this is trap heaven it's beautiful
can't wait for the english ver.
